attributes.action: Allow  voting against petitions on this site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When a petition is on this site, only those in favour of a motion may sign a petition. In several cases, the petition request is openly repugnant and I, like many others, wish to register my opposition.

In this way, some measure of the strength of feeling on various subjects may be obtained, without the need for costly polling.

rejection.details:
This is covered in our faqs:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
